title: Mack Jet Stroke Lettering Brush 1/4 Inch 1962
features: Pure Squirrel and Black Ox hair

description: Pure Squirrel and Black Ox hair make this brush series excellent for overall lettering. It is normally used for large lettering and fill-in work. The long length hair is held by a seamless nickel ferrule. The hair length on this brush is 1 3/8 inches.
